description:

Play this game.

THIS IS NOT QUAKE OR HALF-LIFE I MEAN NOT THIS IS NOTING.

If taking too long to load make sure i have a fast computer.

Windows

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700 Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Mac

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit MacOS 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700 Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB with metal capable GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Linux

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit UBUNTU 16.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700 Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB with Vualkan capable GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Press shift to go to the settings input video.
